page.title: 11A SATURDAY IN CALNE - 1985
page.content: On Saturdays I get up and we have our breakfast together. Then I have a wash and get dressed. I have to get a paper my dad gives me 20p. I get my bike out and go to Brown's. We always have our paper from Brown's. I have to get "The Sun".Then I do a job for my dad. We are having a wall put up so I put some of the bricks out.Then Don and my dad do the wall. Tracey brings the baby over. The baby is called Barry. He is not one yet. I play with him all the time. At about 12 o'clock they go home for dinner and we have ours together. At about 1.30 they come back and get on with the work. I play with Barry till 5 o'clock and then I watch T.V. till 10.30.I like detective programmes best and comedy shows.We all like the films.My mum likes soap operas like "Coronation Street", "Crosroads"and "Dynasty".
